name: The Mask Reveals Disgusting Face
description:
The Mask Reveals Disgusting Face is a short horror game about a depressed person named Gary, who decided to spend some time in empty house outside the town. Bad idea. Some strange force locked him up here. Weird things started happening in the house, driving him crazy. The mask will soon reveal it's face... Will he survive the nightmare?

The game is a basic horror adventure, with quest-like gameplay and some action parts. The soundtrack is mostly consists of exclusive tracks provided by my friends. The graphics are inspired by pixel-horror games. The game has two languages, english and russian.

The project has been in works almost half of year (with great delays, though). Hope you'll enjoy it!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • E or left mouse click - Use
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Esc - Menu
  • F - Flashlight
